title: Eigenvalue estimates for non-normal matrices and the zeros of random orthogonal polynomials on the unit circle
abstract: We prove that for any n×n matrix, A, and z with |z|⩾∥A∥, we have that ∥(z-A)^(-1) ∥⩽cot(^π_(4n))dist(z,spec(A))^(-1). We apply this result to the study of random orthogonal polynomials on the unit circle.
